name: 林利國
objective:
This course will discuss the construction quality of civil engineering in detail. From the learning of statistical quality, QC seven tools and ISO 9000, students can understand how to improve quality and strategy abilities of civil engineering management.
本課程在使學生了解品質之意涵，並訓練學生學習各種工程品質與管理技巧，使其熟悉各種品質分析能力，使學生除了能夠掌握工程品質之外，並具備有工程管理與決策者的能力。
schedule:
CH.1 Project quality and Construction Management
CH.2 Construction material classification properties(Masters of Modern Theories of quality control)
CH.3 Development of quality control technology
CH.4 Seven Basic Tools of Quality
CH.5 Construction quality control skills
CH. 6 Incoming inspection and Management
CH.7 Material quality control and detection technology
CH. 8 ISO 9000 quality assurance systemColumn and comprehensive quality control analysis
CH. 9 Statistical quality control
CH. 10 Engineering quality and Decision Theory
